title: The Root
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Japanese, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Fusion
description: Opened Feb 2015 this is a vegan take away with a few seats for dining in. Offers fusion Japanese and plant-based meals with vegan wraps, sushi, cheesecake, donuts, and ice cream. Beverages are coffee, tea, smoothies, and shakes. Short walk from Wroclaw main square. Staff speak Japanese and English.
